title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pacifica, California
content:
Photo submitted by Daryl Yee, “High above Highway 1 – the Pacific Coast Highway in Pacifica, California, is San Pedro Mountain. Great views south to Half Moon Bay and north to Marin County! And the mountain biking here is great too.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pacifica, California appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
